Actions.Name: Headshot
Actions.Description: A foe in range at 25% HP or lower must save. On a failed save, they are defeated, ignoring all other effects. On a successful save, they are reduced to 1 hp.

Actions.Name: Suppressive Fire
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range 8. While marked, that foe take 2 piercing damage after they use any ability other than their standard move. If they are in cover from the [name], they can ignore this damage. If they don't take this damage for their entire turn, this mark ends.
